name: A Boy and A Ghost
description:
Your beloved brother came searching for you, but only found your ghost. Help him with Swapping places (E) and Focusing Movement(R).

Walls aren't a challenge for you, buttons you cant press, but saws have always been harmful. Stay close, and stay brave.

Controls:

WASD- movement

R- swap movement

E-swap positions

Ghost: Can go through walls, and jump higher. Cant go too far from the player.

Player: Can Step on button to open the door
